attributes.action: TO STOP  DRIVERS UNDER 25  MODIFYING THERE CARS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
TO STOP TEENAGERS MODIFYING THERE CARS 
UNTIL THEY HAVE AT LEAST 4/5 YEARS DRIVING EXPERIENCE

rejection.details: Please re-submit without the block caps.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
